message.content:
Subject: Resignation Letter

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this letter finds you well. It is with a heavy heart that I write to inform you of my decision to resign from [Company Name]. 

[Insert Reason for Leaving]

Despite the challenges and difficulties I have faced during my time here, I am grateful for the opportunities and experiences I have gained. I would like to thank you and the rest of the team for their support and guidance throughout my tenure at [Company Name]. 

Please let me know if there is any further information or documentation required in relation to my resignation. My last day will be [Date], but I am available to work part-time until then to ensure a smooth transition. 

Thank you for your time and consideration, and I wish you all the best for the future. 

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
